short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides the content wrapper, so you can see the background image!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When you access twitter.com, a new icon (twitter logo) will appear in the omnibar, clicking it will hide / show the content wrapper in twitter.com, so you can see the profile background image.
